page.title: 03Werrington Library
page.content: Werrington library is open on the following days:Monday to 8pm.,Tuesday, and Thursday to Saturday inclusive. The library is allowed to have 900 books a year.This includes both children's and adults'.The library has a transfer system to Leek and the Moorlands. The library members are of varied ages.Children from nearby schools come to the library with a teacher to choose a book.It is not only used as a library ,but as a social meeting place to have a friendly chat. There are a good 60% of the 8000 population that use the 21 year old library.As well as the Werrington library there is a mobile library that travels as far as Cellarhead for those who cannot make the journey out.
